nodes.bodyText: I increasingly want the IovArray[8] to be encapsulated in its own component, which we could then ask for a clear-callback. Then we could also test it independently.
I can do this... But lets do this as a followup..
Could we perhaps wire this up after construction, so we don't need to pass the callback through so many layers?
@chrisvest I would like to keep it as it is ... wiring up things after construction is more error-prone and this one is easy to pass through.
